name: BExcelBrowser
sample: <BExcelBrowser context={context} floatingLabelText={'Müşteri Listesi'} hintText={'Müşteri Listesi'} valueType={99} />

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: Indicates the input is disable or not.

infoArray.name: isNumeric
infoArray.desc: Indicates the input is numeric or not.

infoArray.name: valueType
infoArray.desc: Indicates the type of input value.

infoArray.name: onClosing
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when current form is closing.

infoArray.name: _clearActionButton
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when clear action clicked.

infoArray.name: _addDirectActionButton
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when add action clicked.

infoArray.name: _addTableActionButton
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when table action clicked.

infoArray.name: _addExcelActionButton
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when add excel action clicked.
